full_summary:
**Title**
Dust Collector Inspection and Maintenance Services
-----------------------------------------------------

**Contract Reference Number**
WS4072345613-Doc4087864580

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Closing Date and Time**
2023-08-09, 14:00 hours EST

**Amendment Information**
There has been no amendment to the closing time. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time.

**Solicitation Overview**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for Dust Collector Inspection and Maintenance Services for the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Services Required**

The proposed services shall include the following:

* Inspection and maintenance of dust collectors
* Performance of repairs as required

**Technical Specifications**

Heavy equipment maintenance and repair service (Service d'entretien et de réparation d'équipement lourd - UNSPC: 72154501)

**Procurement Method**

Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Selection Criteria**

Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Contract Information**
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**
* Name: Hannah Jeong
* Email: [hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

**Bid Submission Instructions**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the closing date and time specified above. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Additional Information**

Please visit the Ariba Discovery website ([http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16811183?extsite=MTY4MTExODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16811183?extsite=MTY4MTExODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk
